contracts.name: Marketplace

constructorInputs.name: sellerPkh
constructorInputs.description: Public key hash of the seller

constructorInputs.name: price
constructorInputs.description: Price in satoshis

constructorInputs.name: creatorPkh
constructorInputs.description: Public key hash of the creator

constructorInputs.name: royaltyBasisPoints
constructorInputs.description: Royalty percentage in basis points (1/100th of a percent)

deploymentSteps: 1. Instantiate contract with seller, price, creator, and royalty args
2. Get contract address (P2SH address from locking bytecode)
3. Fund contract address with BCH + NFT UTXO
4. Record contract address and first transaction ID
5. Update src/lib/bch/config.ts with contract address

contracts.name: Auction

constructorInputs.name: sellerPkh
constructorInputs.description: Public key hash of the seller

constructorInputs.name: minBid
constructorInputs.description: Minimum bid amount in satoshis

constructorInputs.name: endTime
constructorInputs.description: Auction end time (unix timestamp)

constructorInputs.name: creatorPkh
constructorInputs.description: Public key hash of the creator

constructorInputs.name: royaltyBasisPoints
constructorInputs.description: Royalty percentage in basis points

constructorInputs.name: minBidIncrement
constructorInputs.description: Minimum bid increment in satoshis

deploymentSteps: 1. Instantiate contract with seller, minBid, endTime, creator, royalty, and minBidIncrement args
2. Get contract address (P2SH address from locking bytecode)
3. Fund contract address with BCH + NFT UTXO
4. Record contract address and first transaction ID
5. Update src/lib/bch/config.ts with contract address

contracts.name: AuctionState

constructorInputs.name: sellerPkh
constructorInputs.description: Public key hash of the seller

constructorInputs.name: auctionLockingBytecode
constructorInputs.description: Locking bytecode of the auction contract (35 bytes)

constructorInputs.name: trackingCategory
constructorInputs.description: Token category for the mutable tracking NFT

deploymentSteps: 1. Deploy Auction contract first to get its locking bytecode
2. Instantiate AuctionState with seller, auctionLockingBytecode, and trackingCategory args
3. Get contract address (P2SH address from locking bytecode)
4. Fund contract address with BCH + mutable tracking NFT UTXO
5. Record contract address and first transaction ID
6. Update src/lib/bch/config.ts with contract address

contracts.name: CollectionBid

constructorInputs.name: bidderPkh
constructorInputs.description: Public key hash of the bidder

constructorInputs.name: tokenCategory
constructorInputs.description: Token category of the collection

constructorInputs.name: bidSalt
constructorInputs.description: Salt to differentiate contract addresses

constructorInputs.name: price
constructorInputs.description: Bid price in satoshis

constructorInputs.name: creatorPkh
constructorInputs.description: Public key hash of the creator

constructorInputs.name: royaltyBasisPoints
constructorInputs.description: Royalty percentage in basis points

deploymentSteps: 1. Instantiate contract with bidder, tokenCategory, bidSalt, price, creator, and royalty args
2. Get contract address (P2SH address from locking bytecode)
3. Fund contract address with BCH (bid amount)
4. Record contract address and first transaction ID
5. Update src/lib/bch/config.ts with contract address

contracts.name: FractionalVault

constructorInputs.name: sharesCategory
constructorInputs.description: Token category of the share FTs

constructorInputs.name: totalShares
constructorInputs.description: Total number of shares (e.g., 1000000)

constructorInputs.name: reserveSats
constructorInputs.description: Buyout price in satoshis

constructorInputs.name: claimsScriptHash
constructorInputs.description: Script hash of the FractionalClaims contract

deploymentSteps: 1. Deploy FractionalClaims contract first to get its script hash
2. Instantiate FractionalVault with sharesCategory, totalShares, reserveSats, and claimsScriptHash args
3. Get contract address (P2SH address from locking bytecode)
4. Fund contract address with BCH + original NFT UTXO
5. Record contract address and first transaction ID
6. Update src/lib/bch/config.ts with contract address

contracts.name: FractionalClaims

constructorInputs.name: sharesCategory
constructorInputs.description: Token category of the share FTs (must match vault's sharesCategory)

deploymentSteps: 1. Instantiate contract with sharesCategory arg
2. Get contract address (P2SH address from locking bytecode)
3. Fund contract address with dust BCH + mutable tracking NFT UTXO
4. Record contract address and first transaction ID
5. Update src/lib/bch/config.ts with contract address

contracts.name: P2PKH

constructorInputs.name: pkh
constructorInputs.description: Public key hash

deploymentSteps: 1. Instantiate contract with pkh arg
2. Get contract address (P2SH address from locking bytecode)
3. Fund contract address with BCH UTXOs as needed
4. Record contract address and first transaction ID
5. Update src/lib/bch/config.ts with contract address

notes: Deploy in the order specified to ensure all dependencies are met. FractionalClaims must be deployed before FractionalVault (for claimsScriptHash). Auction must be deployed before AuctionState (for auctionLockingBytecode). All other contracts are independent.
